Title: Requires applicants for subdivision review to obtain confirmation from school district that parcel to be subdivided is actually within school district's boundary
Summary: Requires applicants for subdivision review to obtain confirmation from school district that parcel to be subdivided is actually within school district's boundary.
LawCode: Add ยง99-x, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to school district approval of subdivisions
